answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Patricia – hope the following is helpful:
Dallas – arrow down to “illegal storage”
http://dallascityhall.com/code_compliance/Common_Code_Violations.html 
Tulsa – arrow down to outdoor storage
https://www.cityoftulsa.org/community-programs/neighborhoods/neighborhood-investigations/top-ten-violations.aspx 
Lawrence, KS – arrow down to Porches / Yards
http://lawrenceks.org/attorney/good_neighbor 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Patricia Rippey
text: Does anyone have an ordinance that restricts indoor furniture and grills in front yards?
title: Ordinance restricting furniture in front yards
